strings.string: Select the Root Node to export from.

The Online Quiz export includes Online Quiz Multi-choice Questions and Online Quiz Question Groups. See the manual for details of the export format.
Standard Pages may be additionally exported and can be configured in the section below.
The XML will reflect the asset map hierarchy so atleast the asset name will be exported for every asset under the Root Node (excluding dependant assets).
These settings control what will be placed in the contents tag for Standard Page assets. You may optionally extract the contents between the start and end tags.
The locks on the Import Tools Manager are currently held by user #%s. Only one user is allowed use of this screen at a time.
